long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Delete your cookies simply and safely. Minimal cookies is an open source add on that allows you to regain a bit of privacy in just a minute.

How does it work?
Type in the domains of the cookies you want to keep. All other cookies will get deleted when your browser starts. To see what cookies are in your browser, search for "Site settings" in the settings. There, go to "Cookies and site data" > "See all cookies and site data".

Why does minimal cookies need access to all sites?
This permission is needed to delete the cookies of all sites. Don't worry, it does nothing more - You can look at its code if you want.

Tested under Chrome 79.0.3945.117 and Vivaldi 2.9.1705.41
